domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@MattHancock Dear oh dear!  Dex, as its often called, has been in use for years! 

It’s been approved for use for years!

It’s on NICE list of drugs!

Most cancer patients take it!

Using it for 6 weeks destroyed my late husband’s spine..

It’s now been approved for use for #Covid19 patients.
